channel.title: How to add custom items to a Delta rsps
channel.description: First off you're gonna need the latest version of JDK:www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html Step one:The model you downloaded will be #'s.gz.Then put the .gz files in your Models folder Located in your Client Folder. Step two:Now load up your rsps and make sure you are the Owner,type this in ""Add model (your .gz number )"".If you get disconnected it's okay Step three:In your Model you downloaded Something might say""Ints"" click on it and it copy everything(Ctrl+A) inside there,then go back to your client folder and look for ""Class8.java"" right click on it and choose""Edit"",Do Ctrl+F Search for an Item,go down a little bit and search for ""}""after the symbol Paste your Ints there. Step four:Click Before the if(i ==####) press enter.Then Save.Remember the #"s your item has for next steps. Step five:Make Sure your Client isn't open and your runserver stuff,go back to your Client folder and right click on your compile and change the version,if u dont see a version of java dont change.Then Compile it,Run your server again and spawn it Remember the if(i ==####)? use it in your Pickup or item command. :D .........::IF THE ITEM IS IN THE RIGHT PLACE DONT GO ON FROM HERE.IF IT isn't go on down :P:.......... Go to your Source and look for ""Item.Java"",do CTRL+F and search the place the item correctly goes also Remember the If(i ==####) place it after another one and put a ,.Then Save and Compile.DONE :D

item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

  1. not every one have the method that you type add model.
    2.You need to download the program that make you gz files.
    3.You need to load the models into the models file.
    4.You need to know how to load the gz file using the ints (in class8.java)

item.title: How to add custom items to a Delta rsps
item.dc:creator: @Tranztex Tranztex
item.description:
@Tranztex wrote:

First off you’re gonna need the latest version of JDK:www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html
Step one:The model you downloaded will be #'s.gz.Then put the .gz files in your Models folder Located in your Client Folder.
Step two:Now load up your rsps and make sure you are the Owner,type this in ““Add model (your .gz number )””.If you get disconnected it’s okay
Step three:In your Model you downloaded Something might say"“Ints”" click on it and it copy everything(Ctrl+A) inside there,then go back to your client folder and look for ““Class8.java”” right click on it and choose"“Edit”",Do Ctrl+F Search for an Item,go down a little bit and search for “”}""after the symbol Paste your Ints there.
Step four:Click Before the if(i ==####) press enter.Then Save.Remember the #"s your item has for next steps.
Step five:Make Sure your Client isn’t open and your runserver stuff,go back to your Client folder and right click on your compile and change the version,if u dont see a version of java dont change.Then Compile it,Run your server again and spawn it Remember the if(i ==####)? use it in your Pickup or item command.
…::IF THE ITEM IS IN THE RIGHT PLACE DONT GO ON FROM HERE.IF IT isn’t go on down :P:…
Go to your Source and look for ““Item.Java””,do CTRL+F and search the place the item correctly goes also Remember the If(i ==####) place it after another one and put a ,.Then Save and Compile.DONE
